thread.section_title: 53 Degrees North Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of 53 Degrees North | 53degreesnorth.ie
thread.title: Debbie

author: Debbie
title: Debbie
text: I was delighted to get my ski trousers online and onsale and advised free delivery. On arrival they where too big and i had to return. Again in shop retuned with no issue. Except when i got home realised the trousers instore where cheaper than online by 8euro.. saying free delivery yet upping the clothing price to cover is deception.. Id prefer a 5euro delivery charge added id still pay. Felt a little let down checked some other items online compared to instore and they all the same.
